>>    Login to URL: www.iam.charter.com and and request for BHN/LTWC PID
>>    Select Request Access as BHN network ID/TWC Network ID
For Activation:
>>    After successful creation of Charter ID, the end user will get an confirmation email from IDM with their PID details
>>    When the end user receives their PID they have to activate that ID by navigating to URL: https://iam.charter.com
>>    The above-mentioned link can be accessed only when Charter VPN is connected
>>    After opening the URL: https://iam.charter.com with end user's credentials 'Activate Account' page will be displayed
>>    In 'Activate Account' page enter your PID in User ID field and 4-digit pin will be your birth month[numeric] followed by your birth date (ex., 0305 for March 5th) and click on ACTIVATE button
>>    In the next page set answers for security questions; set your password and logout and login with new password
I can guide you through Infosys Related Requests, Charter Related Requests, ICOMS Application Overview

>>    Navigate to URL: https://panorama.charter.com/  and select IT Support Portal -> Click on Open a Ticket -> Select Desktop Software -> Enterprise Application -> Click on Issue with Software.
>>    As per the below information in the description and raise a ticket,
>>    Hi,
Can you please provide access to HP ALM application for the new person added to our team,
ALM link : https://alm.corp.chartercom.com/qcbin/start_a.jsp
Domain: BHN
Project: ICOMS_Billing, CRM, SMB_CRM
Access level - Lead level. 
>>    After the request has been raised to check the status,
>>    Got to Service Orders -> My Orders -> the raised request will be displayed.

>>    Shared Folder Access request
>>    NCSS Portal Access request
>>     Adding Charter Mail to Charter DL
>>    BRF Access request
>>    >>Configuring Charter Outlook
Scroll up to view the previous options, please type a valid request

>    Adding Mail IDs to DL
>    Cubicle / Desktop / Laptop allocation
>    Adding URLs to Trusted Sites
>    Allocating ALM asset in AMS

>    You need to send an email to Aswin_Subramanian@infosys.com for adding the email id and phone number.
>    The Email should contain proper explanation of request along with Employee ID, Infosys Email Id and Mobile number

>    You need to send email to Kamala_c@Infosys.com for Cubicle Allocation and ODC Access

>    The Email should contain proper explanation of request along with Employee ID, Infosys Email Id and Mobile number

Prerequisite: cubicle allocation should be done..
>    Respective person needs to talk to Nandakumar_J (or) Thulasiram_T before raising any requests.
>    For Desktop: Either of them will help the resource by raising the One-Stop request.
>    For Laptop: After discussing with Nandakumar or Thulasiram, an AHD needs to be raised so that they can get the approval from DM for the same.

>    Respective person needs to get the approval email for ISG approval
>    After the completion of approval process then needs to raise AHD for adding the URL's in the Trusted sites attaching ISG approval.

>    You need to send an email to EvelineRajam_S@infosys.com for the ALM Allocation in Asset.
>    The Email should contain proper explanation of request along with Name, Employee ID and Infosys Email Id.

>>    Before raising VPN request the user should get BHN Account created to get access to BHN VPN
>>    For getting the BHN account, the user should navigate to https://iam.charter.com/landing/  and navigate to Request Access -> Select Bright house Account Request 
>>    In 'My Permissions', you can verify whether the request have been approved or not
>>    For raising the VPN access, go to https://panorama.charter.com/  and select IT Support Portal -> Click on Open a Ticket -> Select IT Network Services -> VPN -> Select Request Access to VPN
>>    Select email address for whom to raise the request
>>    Update Device Type -> Non Company Issues (Select this first then select Company Name)
>>    Company Name -> BHN
>>    Select the Role as 'Default VPN'
>>    Add additional comments such as below,
o    Hi, we have new members joined to our team who needs LBHN Checkpoint VPN.
Server Address or Name: mobile.mybrighthouse.com
Display Name: BHN-Tampa VPN Gateway
First Name    Last Name    PID's

>>    User should login to Panorama.charter.com
>>    Near the Search icon you can see a grid icon click that and select ALL APPS.
>>    Select BSAM REQUEST
>>    After clicking that a new tab will be opened, in that new tab enter your credentials
>>    In the Left corner Select the Category BSAM REQUEST
>>    Click on the BSAM REQUEST drop down and select USER ACCESS REQUEST
>>    A form will be opened Kindly fill it and add the error screenshot and Submit it

intents.tag: Adding Charter Mail to Charter DL
patterns: Adding Charter Mail to Charter DL
responses: >>    We need to send a mail to Vinoth with First Name, Last Name and PID to request Jonathan (DL Owner) to add to new users to DL

>>    After the PID creation process is done user will receive a mail from Field Glass will steps to create an account
>>    Click on Create Account button in that mail and register with your details
>>    Field glass should be submitted on a weekly basis with 9 hours per day for offshore and 8 hours for onsite
>>    If the User was on Leave/Holiday the value should be 0 for that particular day and proper comments should be updated

>>    Navigate to below path 'http://varonis.corp.chartercom.com/DP/DesktopDefault.aspx?tabindex=10&tabid=155&tabParentid=0',
>>    Select 'Folder request'
>>    Click on Change Users
>>    Enter the names to get access and select it and click on Update
>>    Click on Browse
>>    Select Charter -> Tampa -> National
>>    Click Ok
>>    Click on Add -> the folder will get access to 'Operations', tab.
>>    Provide explanation as below and mention the date as Dec 2021 and click on Submit:
o    Hi, We are part of Billing QA Team, we need to access to Development\QA folder to share the artifacts within the team, please provide access to the users added. Thanks!
>>    Respective Person needs to send an email to  daniil.karpechenko@netcracker.com  for getting the NCSS Portal Access
>>    Respective Person needs to send an email to  DL-RDM-Operations@charter.com as attached for getting the BRF Portal Access

>>    Open Outlook -> Click on File -> Add Account
>>    Enter your Charter email ID 
>>    Select Other credentials option
>>    Enter your PID prefixed with 'CHTR' and password
>>    It should get loaded successfully
>>    ICOMS, CRM, ATLAS\n Type any one name(space)info to know more

>>    ICOMS (Integrated Communications Operations Management System) is a multi-service, fully-integrated, subscriber management and billing system designed to manage all aspects of the modern cable operator's business, including the provisioning of all telephony services and convergent billing .Timeslot generation, Development Number Master- Tenant Mapping, Marketing id addition, Dwell Type Update, Equipment Serial Number generation are possible only ICOMS\n  Type 'Detailed Knowledge transfer' for KT documents

>>    NetCracker CRM is a location centric user interface designed for call center agents to create customers, accounts, and orders. It is a comprehensive business support system (BSS) that provides a positive user experience and enhanced capabilities in multiple areas such as customer management, account management, order entry, pay-per-view (PPV), and equipment management. Future Bill View for next 3 months possible only in CRM\n Type 'Detailed Knowledge transfer' for KT documents

>>    Atlas is CRM application where business user are able to shop offered services for the customers. It does not support disconnect and re-connect\n Type 'Detailed Knowledge transfer' for KT documents and 'ATLAS-recordings' for recorded session

ICOMS (Integrated Communications Operations Management System) is a multi-service, fully-integrated, subscriber management and billing system designed to manage all aspects of the modern cable operator's business, including the provisioning of all telephony services and convergent billing .Timeslot generation, Development Number Master- Tenant Mapping, Marketing id addition, Dwell Type Update, Equipment Serial Number generation are possible only ICOMS
>>    NetCracker CRM is a location centric user interface designed for call center agents to create customers, accounts, and orders. It is a comprehensive business support system (BSS) that provides a positive user experience and enhanced capabilities in multiple areas such as customer management, account management, order entry, pay-per-view (PPV), and equipment management. Future Bill View for next 3 months possible only in CRM
>>    Atlas is CRM application where business user are able to shop offered services for the customers. It does not support disconnect and re-connect
 Type 'Detailed Knowledge transfer' for KT documents and 'ATLAS-recordings' for recorded session
>>    Install, Upgrade, Downgrade, Reconnect, Disconnect, SRO, Trouble call & Transfer

>>    The billing process involves receiving billing records from various networks, determining the billing rates associated with the billing records, calculating the cost for each billing record, aggregating these records periodically to generate invoices, sending invoices to the customer, and collecting payments received from the customer.

>>    Residential service is furnished to an individual of family in their residence where the service will be used solely by the customer or family members for personal, domestic or social purposes.\n>>    Business service is furnished for customer use in any premise regularly used in whole or in part for any business, trade or professional use.
